resumen: Web application developer passionate about creating innovative and functional digital solutions.
description_1_about_me: Hey! Welcome to my little digital corner. I'm Luis Angel Vazquez Carrillo.
description_3_about_me: With 2 years of experience in software development, I focus on creating modern and efficient web applications. I'm passionate about learning new technologies and applying them to new projects.

experience_1.title: IT technician
experience_1.company: Unidad Universitaria de Secuenciacion Masiva y Bioinformatica (UUSMB)
experience_1.description: Development of a chatbot for customer service and support on the cost quoting services platform for Sequencing.

experience_2.title: Full stack developer
experience_2.company: Universidad de Investigación e Innovación de México (UIIX)
experience_2.description: Development of a system for controlling income and notifications of financial debts and student reports.

experience_3.title: Back-end development
experience_3.company: Centro Nacional de Investigación y Desarrollo Tecnológico (CENIDET)
experience_3.description: Development of a chatbot for the Technological Institute of Zacatepec (ITZ) for resolving doubts of the institute's students.

education_1.title: Computer Systems Engineer
education_1.institution: Tecnologico Nacional de México campus Zacatepec
education_1.description: Studies focused on programming, algorithms, data structures, and software development.

education_2.title: Oracle One Education Program (ONE)
education_2.description: Intensive training in web development, including HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, Java with Object-Oriented Programming.

extra_1.title: Conference: ITZ Academic Week
extra_1.description: I was a speaker at the conference "Creating a Chatbot for User Support" organized by the Zacatepec Technological Institute, where I explained to the students in the Computer Systems Department the process of developing a chatbot.

extra_2.title: Hackathon HackMorelos
extra_2.description: I participated in the development of a prototype application using Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence to predict diseases based on the user's lifestyle. The development was completed during a 48-hour event.

extra_3.title: International Summer Research (VIICyT)
extra_3.description: I collaborated on a project proposed by CENIDET to develop a chatbot that would address the questions of users at the Technological Institute of Zacatepec, with the aim of automating the resolution of frequently asked questions and improving the experience of students.
